title: News24.com | WATCH | Exclusive look inside Cape Town Stadium where 6 000 tourists are preparing to fly home
description: News24 has had an exclusive look at the Cape Town Stadium site where up to 6 000 foreign tourists are due to be processed before returning home safely. Watch.
content:
News24 had an exclusive look at the Cape Town Stadium site where up to 6 000 foreign tourists are due to be processed before returning home safely.
The stadium hosted the 2010 Soccer World Cup, then rock concerts, then rugby matches - and even a world record… [+2728 chars]
